${ModID}:DivineProtection.NAME: Snecko's Protection
DESCRIPTIONS: Can only lose #b%d more HP this turn.
Can no longer be harmed this turn.

Split.NAME: Split
DESCRIPTIONS: When its HP is at or below #b75%, will split into #b2 smaller slimes with

Painful Stabs.NAME: Burning Stabs
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you receive attack damage from this enemy, add a #yBurn into your discard pile.
